post.body: Yes that ("label execs should see themselves as servants...) is my favorite pt-power to the art and the ppl! Gotta love Bob Lefsetz.
for the comment on my blog post! I especially liked this lil post of yours: http://tinyurl.com/3tagqb Nice "meeting" you!
yes, congrats to @jaybear for his fake christmas tree bliss-Had to vote in aggreeance: http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/28281454
Thanks for the http://1and1.com reco-will look. I think it's time to breakup with Hostmonster :(
Wow-longest time I went MIA on Twitter! Holiday madness-now sneaking away for one last wk call then nonstop family time. Peace, Tweeps-xo
Top Yourself-The Raconteurs. â™« http://blip.fm/~18tty
Kanye West gives us steering wheel singers hope! Sorry, but what would Simon Cowell say!?? http://tinyurl.com/6pg9wn:P
Major labels should have a big Going Out of Business Sale: http://tinyurl.com/a83w38
RT @gleanard...Reading: "Gadgets, Games Help Musicians Offset Declining Sales | Gadget Lab from Wired.com" ( http://tinyurl.com/6glemw )
Well F getting things done 2nite. Have an important dinner to go to-doesn't help that I love the co: @bzkicks @ryanswagar & lovely fiance.
Green tea. Today's gonna be a two-bagger.
Love this client, and our new social Web strategy, but cannot look at one more photo! Night, Tweeps. xo
BIG PhOto Files moooove soooo slow....
Thanks for the great input by @freakingid and @andydrish on Why Twitter: http://tinyurl.com/57svss
New blog post: Why Twitter (People Still Ask That)? http://tinyurl.com/57svss Why do YOU use Twitter?
Just hit a wall and calling in a night-been spending WAY too much time on new Latina artist/client's sites. Night, Tweeps! xo
Pulling together music client's photos, couldn't help but take a few to enjoy our photographer's site: http://www.annawebber.com/
Meeting up w @StephanieSINGS at this event 1/7/09: http://www.billboardevents.com/billboardevents/dml/index.jsp Oh yes, I'll be tweeting!
Workload on track, Brighton's cookies are baked, and we're off to the preschool Holiday party (she's so excited).
Just got the word that I'm back on with an Austin artist. Fun launch stuff-yippieeee!
